title: Dark Passage
description: Alternate Cover Edition for 9781470027315.**We are offering free ebook copies if you send an email request- week of New Year's- Just send an email- paige.mmw@gmail.com Part 3 is in works and out this Spring! I wish each and every one of you a wonderful 2013!Jen hides in a rundown mansion when her life falls apart, has vivid experiences with a beautiful male entity who longs to be her soulmate, and must choose reality of living or dead. Her childhood friend Ivy 19, from a rough past, can communicate with the dead, and other supernatural gifts emerge. Ivy will resist the evil that would separate the lovers. â€œWith one final glance behind her, Jen urged her horse forward, and toward the safety of the mountains. Her heart was heavy and she immediately thought of the other realm. Her hope was that they were aware of what had happened and would help. Chaos was already breaking out; and the world was in danger of slipping back to a time of great darkness, reminiscent of the Middle Ages."
author: M.L. Woolley
